issue.title: [CI][R] Implement CI on Apple M1 for R
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16190?focusedCommentId=17531215) by Dewey Dunnington (paleolimbot):*
I know this is probably on the list already, but one of the things I would love is the ability to install nightly binaries for M1!

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16190?focusedCommentId=17531658) by Jacob Wujciak-Jens (assignUser):*
`[~paleolimbot]` I'll keep an I on it during ARROW-16400 :)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16190?focusedCommentId=17561414) by Jacob Wujciak-Jens (assignUser):*
This is currently blocked due to the github actions runner not supporting M1 natively. Using rosetta and `arch -arm64` is a mess for R so we have to wait until M1 support is released. There is already a pre-release version so it should be there soon (~end of Q2?)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16190?focusedCommentId=17605477) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
